name: A Dicey Infiltration: A Six Sided Cult
name_original: A Dicey Infiltration: A Six Sided Cult
description:
A Dicey Infiltration: The Six Sided Cult is a Strategy Card Game that uses the Roll of the Dice to decide how many action points you get and how many cards you draw. Use the Deck Builder to create your personal deck to infiltrate the Six Sided Cult!

A tutorial and an Endless mode ( + high score) are included.

Made by Luc / Celestial

Special thanks to Kenney for the sound effects! (kenney.nl)
